description:
<What do we learn in this Chinese course?>

In this course, we will focus on studying the right usage of essential Chinese verbs which are most frequently used in the real Chinese conversation.

<Why do I have to take this course?>

Normally lots of students are just aware of the meaning of those verbs but they have many problems when they actually want to speak Chinese using those verbs. It is because they are not quite sure how to use them correctly. So in this course, we will focus on studying how to use those verbs correctly in the real sentences as well as covering many related nouns and grammars.

<Can I take this course? I think I'm still not good at Chinese>

If you have studied basic Chinese pronunciation, you can take this course with no problem. You don't even need the dictionary because you will naturally know the meanings and pronunciations of the vocabularies taking this course.

<Do I have to spend much time? I'm kind of busy.>

Not at all. You can master this course just spending very short time. The goal of this course is to let you know the right way of studying Chinese and let you practice what you have learned by yourself in your real conversation with Chinese people.



<Below are list of the essential Chinese verbs you can learn in this course - updating>

* 告诉 (tell)

* 给 (give)

* 收 (get, take)

* 喜欢 (like)

* 讨厌 (dislike)

* 借 (lend, borrow)
title: How to Use the most Useful Chinese Verbs in Conversation.
